website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for either therapeutic purposes or spa parties.
pros: Deep, oversized stainless steel tank allows easy immersion of hand and wrist, foot and ankle, or elbow
cons: You can't adjust the temperature, but the unit does a great job keeping the paraffin at a constant temperature

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for RA Sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday for rheumatoid arthritis in my hands. I warm up for 15 minutes with paraffin, then use flexion gloves for 10, then do the exercises my therapist gives me.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeIV

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 8 USES
customer_reviews.text: I ONLY SELECT 1 STAR BECAUSE I WAS FORCE TO BY THE PROMPT, IF I HAD TRUE FREEDOM I WOULD HAVE GIVEN THIS PRODUCT ZERO STARS. THERE IS NO WAY TO EXPRESS HOW MUCH DISAPPOINTMENT ONE FEELS AFTER PAYING CLOSE TO $300.00 FOR AN ITEM THAT BOAST ABOUT ITS QUALITY AND RELIABILITY COMPARED TO EVERYTHING ELSE OUT THERE ; AND AFTER GOING OUT ON A LIMB FOR IT TO BE COMPLETELY USELESS AFTER 8 USES. I PURCHASED OCT 30TH 2018 IT STOPPED WORKING TODAY NOVEMBER 30 2018 AND GUESS WHAT THE RETURN WINDOW ENDED YESTERDAY NOVEMBER 29TH. I'M SURE A HIGH END CROCKPOT CAN DO A BETTER JOB FOR WAY LESS MONEY:-(
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: The wax takes along time to melt. Went to ...
customer_reviews.text: The wax takes along time to melt. Went to go do my hands after 6 hours being plugged in and wax was not completely melted then today I plugged in and wax was melted within an hour. Besides that I am really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia D. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love it...works well!
customer_reviews.text: Item works very well...although there is no heat control the item works well keeping it constantly at one temperature. Would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to me by my physical therapist
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me by my physical therapist. He leaves it on all day everyday and so now I have one and love it! I have very bad arthritis in my hands and was told it will only get worse as I get older. This is such a great relief for the pain. My new occupational therapist uses it for me also and was thrilled that I owned one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Skulski

customer_reviews.title: Professional Qualty Parafin Bath
customer_reviews.text: This parafin bath unit is the same as that used in certified hand therapy clinics. Reliability and temperature constancy are highly commendable. I leave the unit "on" for weeks at at time. Temperature holds steady at 126 degrees F. That said, I still think the unit should have a clear-read thermometer and power switch on the body of the unit. I periodically use a cooking thermometer to check temp, otherwise I would give the unit a perfect 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: paragello

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased on January 29, 2018. It was perfect for my needs for 8 months and then it quit heating up on 9/25/2018. The light comes on but the was remains cold. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb W.

customer_reviews.title: Nerve-Pain Free!
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother's physical therapist recommended this after her hand surgery. It has seriously helped with all of the nerve pain since surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I tried the Parabath at my therapists ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I tried the Parabath at my therapists and at her recommendation ordered one for home use. The entire family has enjoyed the warm sensation when used.
customer_reviews.author: Grant L. Bushaw

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I have bad arthritis in my hands ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have bad arthritis in my hands and it really helps. I keep one at work and one at home
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L Burton

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It quit working..... Had it for less than a year, the light goes on but it doesn't heat up. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Gildner

customer_reviews.title: lousy product
customer_reviews.text: item does not have a temp. control a very dangerous and hazardous situation you could burn yourself
customer_reviews.author: Walter Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Very soothing for the arthritis in my hand and wrist
customer_reviews.author: bruce in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Dr. ordered
customer_reviews.text: I have Lupus, RA and sclerotic hands....this parabath is exactly like the one they use in therapy and helps keep my hands mobile
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: This is a $40 product selling for $240. I am having a hard time returning this cheap plastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Thoan Tran

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the quality. It keeps a rim of solid paraffin around the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Huss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good unit. Leaves hands feeling extremely soft and helps with the stiffness of the arthritis in my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a physical therapist’s office, and then ordered one for my own use. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: Size of paraffin wax Heat therapy
customer_reviews.text: I need to return two items Parabath Model #24050 and therabath model TB6 I ware a size 10 in most shoes but depending on the make could be 10.5 neither therabath or Parabath are large enough for my feet
customer_reviews.author: rich harshman

customer_reviews.title: Helps my arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Great for arthritis and joint injuries. I use it just be for physiotherapy on my hand and helps the stiffness. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is working out to relieve pain in my hands from arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too hot
customer_reviews.text: It is too hot. The paraffin bath at the rehab center is just the right temperature, but this is uncomfortable. Sorry that I don't have a thermometer to indicate the temperature. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: book addict

customer_reviews.title: I live in Colorado and dry skin is a problem ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in Colorado and dry skin is a problem. I use this bath daily and follow up with moisturizer and gloves at night to keep dry cracking skin smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Brucker

customer_reviews.title: The unit works great. I would highly recommend if you have hand
customer_reviews.text: very soothing. The unit works great. I would highly recommend if you have hand pain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parabath Paraffin Wax Bath
customer_reviews.text: It is serving the purpose I bought it for. I have arthritis in my hands and while it dosen't cure my hands. I get some relief from the hot wax.
customer_reviews.author: shirley lochner

customer_reviews.title: Parabath Paraffin
customer_reviews.text: It has no heat control and it takes 4-6 hours to heat up. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

product_meta.title: Parabath Paraffin Wax Bottom Grill Accessory, Safety Plate to Protect Skin from Heat Source in TheraBand Heating Bath, Heat Protector for Wax Warmer
product_meta.description: Style Name:Bottom Grill AccessoryParaBath Paraffin Bath provides soothing moist heat to warm joints, tissue and skin. The ParaBath system is ideal for the treatment of patients suffering from pain associated with arthritis, strains, sprains, joint stiffness, and it is also used to increase range of motion. The deep oversized tank allows easy immersion of hand and wrist, foot and ankle, or elbow. Made of stainless steel, the tank features an insulated outer housing to help retain heat. A variety of high quality accessories are available.
feature_bullets: Insert into bottom of unit to keep skin from heat
Placed in stainless steel tank only after paraffin wax has completely melted
If grill is placed between tank and un-melted wax, damage may occur to both unit and grill
Remove grill before allowing wax to cool and solidify

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
